text: “Our mothers taught us to judge a person by the company he keeps. In the case of Joe Biden, his choice of Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez as the co-chairwoman of his climate task force tells us an awful lot about the growing dangers of a Biden presidency.” https://t.co/VmIZJUNlG0
